content: **knitted drops hat and neck warmer in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ee-507 yarn group e or c + c ---------------------------------------------------------- **hat** size s/m - l/xl head circumference 54/56 - 58/60 cm / 21 /22 - 22½ /23½ height 25-26 cm / 9 3/4 -10 1/4 materials drops snow from garnstudio 100 g for all sizes in color no 53 light gray drops double pointed needles size 8 mm / us 11 - or size needed to get 11 sts x 15 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 ** pattern for the astrid neck warmer can be found here 1 ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/157-32-astrid-neckwarmer
